name: Meet a married woman at a hot spring
name_original: Meet a married woman at a hot spring
description:
This is a game where you have sex with a married woman you meet in a hot spring.

Click on the woman's body to accumulate Heart Points.
Use the heart points you have saved to release the next scene.
There are a total of 10 different scenes.
Click and save heart points to release scenes and do more and more naughty things.

Saving is automatic and even if the game is over, the heart points and released scenes are saved as they are, so you can immerse yourself in the game without fear of failure.

Extensive animations and facial expressions enhance the immersion of the game.

Character dialogue can be switched between automatic and manual.
By setting it to automatic, the dialogue switches at regular intervals, making it user-friendly.
